title: Working student at CHECK24 in Munich
description: CHECK24 is Germany's largest comparison site for insurances, rental cars, and much more. My tasks at CHECK24 include:
tasks: Web development with React and Angular for large mobile and desktop applications
Conducting user research and usability tests
Feature development from requirements engineering over creating mockups to user testing

title: Working student at TIM Solutions in Munich
description: TIM Solutions is a small software company in Munich specializing in business process automation software. My tasks at TIM Solutions included:
tasks: Web development with React and Angular for large mobile and desktop applications
Conducting user research and usability tests
Feature development from requirements engineering over creating mockups to user testing

title: Internship at TIM Solutions in Munich
description: With my first project at TIM I created the new user interface for the process automation software TIM. The project included the following tasks:
tasks: Creating TIM's UI with Balsamiq based on the gathered requirements
Continuous  user testing and refinement of the UI
Creating a high-level, click-able prototype with Sketch and InVision

title: Internship at Agistix Inc. in San Mateo, CA
description: After my semester abroad in Kentucky, I worked as an intern at Agistix Inc., a Silicon Valley startup specializing in logistics software. My tasks at Agistix included:
tasks: Conducting user tests to improve the Agistix's platform
Creating prototypes for new features for the logistics platform
